front.title: Application of the IGMP MIB, RFC 2993, and Cable Device MIB, RFC 2669, to Docsis 1,1 Devices

abstract.t: This memo describes the application of a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes the application of the managed objects specified in RFC 2933, [19], and proposes a new object for the Cable Device MIB, RFC 2669 [25], for SNMP-based management of DOCSIS 1.1 IGMPv2 compliant interfaces. This memo is a product of the IPCDN working group within the Internet Engineering Task Force. Comments are solicited and should be addressed to the working group's mailing list at ipcdn@ietf.org and/or the author.
